.. _steinhardt:

Steinhardt *et al.*
===================

.. code-block:: bibtex

    @article{steinhardt1983bond,
        title={Bond-orientational order in liquids and glasses},
        author={Steinhardt, Paul J and Nelson, David R and Ronchetti, Marco},
        journal={Physical Review B},
        volume={28},
        number={2},
        pages={784},
        year={1983},
        publisher={APS}
    }
